original_title: The Beyond: Looking Back - The Creation of the Beyond
overview: This 48-minute documentary gathers together many of the technical people who helped create Lucio Fulci's THE BEYOND. On hand for interviews are cinematographer Sergio Salvati, producer Fabrizio De Angelis, screenwriter Dardano Sacchetti, artist Enzo Sciotti and Fulci's daughter Antonella.
title: The Beyond: Looking Back - The Creation of the Beyond
